summary: Tested 4 features: ScrollToTop navigation, Community page member status, Discount codes at checkout, and Payment form UI. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: ScrollToTop component correctly uses useLocation hook to detect route changes and scrolls to top
CommunityPage properly calls refreshUser() on mount to check for approval status updates
PaymentForm has complete discount code integration with validation, display, and removal functionality
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 requested features verified working: 1) ScrollToTop scrolls page to top on navigation, 2) Community page shows member view for approved users and pending status for pending users, 3) WELCOME10 discount code applies 10% off at checkout, 4) Payment form shows subtotal, discount, and total with discount code applied.

scroll_to_top_navigation.details: Tested navigation from homepage to Shop and Shop to Community - page scrolls to top on each navigation

community_page_member_status.details: Admin user sees member view with post creation. Non-members see 'Members Only' card. refreshUser() called on mount to check approval status.

discount_codes_checkout.details: WELCOME10 code applies 10% discount. Shows subtotal ($21.59), discount (-$2.16), total ($19.43). Can remove discount with X button.

payment_form_ui.details: Shows discount code input, Apply button, payment methods (Card/Stripe/PayPal), and correct totals

api_test_results.POST /api/discount-codes/validate: PASS - Returns valid=true, discountType=percentage, discountValue=10, discountAmount calculated correctly

notes: Resend domain verification (mothernaturalhealinglab.com) is still pending on user's end - this is external to the app and cannot be tested.
